mapper.insert: INSERT INTO myplant(plant_id, user_id, myplant_nick, myplant_image, myplant_pot, myplant_length, myplant_radius1, myplant_radius2,first_date,schedule_date) VALUES ( #{plantId}, #{userId}, #{myplantNick}, #{myplantImage}, #{myplantPot}, #{myplantLength}, #{myplantRadius1}, #{myplantRadius2}, #{firstDate}, #{scheduleDate} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM plant WHERE distbNm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{plantId}, '%')
mapper.update: update myplant set represent = 1 where myplant_id=#{myplantId}
update myplant set represent = 0 where user_id=#{userId};
update myplant set webpush_date = #{dayInput} , webpush_time = #{timeInput} where myplant_id=#{myplantId};
UPDATE user_table SET point = point - ( SELECT COUNT(*) * 10 FROM myplant WHERE (#{todayInDays} - myplant.schedule_date) >= 6 AND myplant.user_id = user_table.user_id );
